articles.title: BofA Analyst Is Bullish On Apple - See Why
articles.content:
Apple IncÂ (NASDAQ: AAPL) will likely see an increase in iPhone sales, thanks to the rollout of 5G networks worldwide and the possibility of augmented/virtual reality glasses coming later this year, Bank of America said.
Analyst Wamsi Mohan noted that as the world comes out of the pandemic, replacement cycles for smartphones are "re-normalizing," pointing out that a January 2022 survey found that 30% of respondents ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

articles.title: Stock market faces the most 'massive misallocation' of 'capital in the history of mankind,' says ARK's Cathie Wood
articles.content: Cathie Wood, the star fund manager and chief executive of ARK Invest, took to CNBC on Thursday to defend ARK's woeful performance over the past year.

articles.title: All You Need to Know About Apple (AAPL) Rating Upgrade to Strong Buy
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

articles.title: These 17 small-cap stock ideas have momentum and valuation on their side, says Jefferies
articles.content: Don't count out all small-cap stocks, says Jefferies, which offers up more than a dozen names that look cheap, and have plenty of momentum behind them.

articles.title: Synopsys' (SNPS) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
articles.content: Synopsys (SNPS) Q1 results reflect benefits from solid demand for its products amid rapid adoption of Big Data, faster computation and Machine Learning.

articles.title: Tyler's (TYL) Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Up Y/Y
articles.content: Tyler's (TYL) Q4 earnings reflect benefits from post-acquisition contributions of NIC and constant rebound of market and sales activities at pre-COVID levels.

articles.title: 3 Reasons Why Deere & Company Will Continue to Grow
articles.content: When you mix crop production with advanced technology, you get "the Tesla of farming."

articles.title: Watch for 4 Top Stock Holdings in Warren Buffett's Portfolio
articles.content: For Warren Buffett, diversification is not the key to creating wealth. More than 75%% of his investment is concentrated in these four stocks ??? AAPL, BAC, AXP and KO.

articles.title: How to Find Strong Buy Computer and Technology Stocks Using the Zacks Rank
articles.content: The Zacks Rank offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks and build a winning investment portfolio. Here's why you should take advantage.
